definition: string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination/perfect pair
bead/pearl/CL:粒[li4],顆|颗[ke1]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
jade annulus
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: It is not every couple that is a pair.
sentences.chinese: 成雙成對多，珠聯璧合少。

sentences.english: John and his wife are well - matched.
sentences.chinese: 約翰和他妻子是珠聯璧合。

sentences.english: All Portfolio wine is handmade with painstaking attentions to details.
sentences.chinese: 所有珠聯璧合葡萄酒都是手工製作，精心細緻。

sentences.english: The Chinese and Western architecture styles set each other off perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 中西建築風格在這裏真是珠聯璧合。

sentences.english: And if Scola fits next to Yao Ming?
sentences.chinese: 而且，如果斯科拉和姚明珠聯璧合呢？

definition: (of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
regular script (Chinese calligraphic style)
when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
loyal/sincere/sound
lit. outside-flexible, inside-firm (idiom)/fig. velvet glove
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower/all the King's horses and all the King's men
to be successful in every endeavor
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
singular and majestic/strange and grand
in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
to praise
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
with a will, you can achieve anything (idiom); cf 精誠所至，金石為開|精诚所至，金石为开[jing1 cheng2 suo3 zhi4 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1]
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
